name: MEC Borderland Pants - Men's
description:
For cool weather and a range of outdoor pursuits, these pants are ready to test your limits outside. The articulated fit and gusseted crotch make it easy to move on trails, waterways or mountains. The simple and sleek design uses a tough soft shell fabric that sheds moisture and cuts the wind.Soft shell with DWR coating is tough, moisture shedding and comfortable.Flat waistband with belt loops is comfortable under a backpack.Gussetted crotch and articulated fit through the knee gives you a full range of motion.2 zippered hand pockets and 1 right-side zippered thigh pocket.Straight cuffs with hem grommets for boot loops.

        Sustainability
